element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm calculates the least cost path from a given point up to the closest destination point.

element.name: ACCCOST
element.text: An accumulated cost surface, calculated with either anisotropic or isotropic cost algorithms.

element.name: LAYERS
element.text: A set of additional layers to study along the least cost path.

element.name: POINT
element.text: The starting point from which the least cost path will be computed.

element.name: PROFILELINE
element.text: A layer with one single line representing the least cost path

element.name: PROFILEPOINTS
element.text: A points layer with a point in each cell that is crossed along the least cost path. It contains the following fields in its attributes table: * X: coordinate X of each point. * Y: coordinate Y of each point. * Z: coordinate Z of each point. * Projected distance: projected covered distance from origin. * Real distance: real distance covered from origin. * Values of the selected additional layers.
